creators.name: Rose Kamal Love
creators.bio: A friendly ambivert who loves writing software, trying to make a difference through YouTube and Kroto.

courses.title: Full Stack Blog App with Next.js
courses.description: In this video series, I will review how I built https://rosekamal.love using Next.js as the front-end framework, tailwind CSS for the styling system, TRPC for  API Routes, and Prisma for our Database. I will show you how to create a complete stack application that is type-safe from the backend till the front end shares the same types. And then deploy it on Vercel.

events.title: Web Development Bootcamp
events.description: In this bootcamp I will go through complete web development fundamentals and modern full stack development tech tutorials.
